title: One Piece Episode 17 Review - Usopp Joins the Crew!
author: One Piece Reviewer
description: Analysis of Episode 17 covering Luffy's defeat of Captain Kuro, the debut of Going Merry, and Usopp's decision to join the Straw Hat Pirates.

title: First Time Watching One Piece Episode 17 - Usopp JOINS!! Going Merry!!
author: Anime First Timer
description: First-time viewer reaction to Episode 17, focusing on emotional moments of Usopp joining the crew and receiving the Going Merry.

title: The Significance of the Going Merry in One Piece
author: Crunchyroll Features
description: Article discussing the Going Merry's introduction in Episode 17 and its lasting impact throughout the series.

title: Luffy vs Kuro - Gomu Gomu no Kane [HD]
author: One Piece Clips
description: HD clip of Luffy's final attack against Captain Kuro using the Gomu Gomu no Kane technique.

title: One Piece Podcast Episode 17: The End of Syrup Village
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: Detailed discussion of Episode 17 including character analysis of Usopp's decision to join, the symbolism of the Going Merry, and Kuro's defeat.

title: Usopp's Journey: From Liar to Brave Warrior
author: CBR Staff Writer
description: Character analysis of Usopp starting from his introduction and joining the crew in Episode 17 through his development in later arcs.
